fr.polytechtours.prd.multiagent.util

Class Commun

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.polytechtours.prd.multiagent.util.Commun

  • public class Commun
extends java.lang.Object
    This class propose the common methods for the general use Specially, the method for creating jobs and saving to files, the method for reading jobs from files, the method for getting the end time maximum of a sequence of jobs
    Since:
    Nov 30, 2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Boyang Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Commun() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createRandomJobsAndResources(int nbJobs, int nbResouorces, int percJobAgentA, java.lang.String filename)
      Method to create random jobs and to save a file The total amount of each resource is fixed to 1000 Each consumption of resource is set randomly between 1 and 1000 Each start time is set randomly between 1 and 1440 mns (one day) Each end time is set randomly between s+1 and 1440-s
      static int getMaxEnd(java.util.ArrayList<Job> jobs)
      Method used to get the end time maximum of a sequence of jobs sorted
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> ReadDataFromFile(java.lang.String fileName, int typeOfSort)
      Read from a file to load all the jobs saved in this file The result to return is of type the HashMap: the keys are machine, jobs which are related to a machine and a list of jobs, numJob for number of job, numResource for number of resources, numJobAgentA for number of job of agent A

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Commun

        public Commun()

    • Method Detail

      • createRandomJobsAndResources

        public static void createRandomJobsAndResources(int nbJobs,
                                                int nbResouorces,
                                                int percJobAgentA,
                                                java.lang.String filename)
        Method to create random jobs and to save a file The total amount of each resource is fixed to 1000 Each consumption of resource is set randomly between 1 and 1000 Each start time is set randomly between 1 and 1440 mns (one day) Each end time is set randomly between s+1 and 1440-s
        Parameters:
        nbJobs - total number of jobs
        nbResouorces - total number of resources
        percJobAgentA - percentage of jobs which belongs to agent A
        filename - file name to save jobs

      • getMaxEnd

        public static int getMaxEnd(java.util.ArrayList<Job> jobs)
        Method used to get the end time maximum of a sequence of jobs sorted
        Parameters:
        jobs - a list of jobs
        Returns:
        end time max of a sequence of jobs

      • ReadDataFromFile

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> ReadDataFromFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                    int typeOfSort)
        Read from a file to load all the jobs saved in this file The result to return is of type the HashMap: the keys are machine, jobs which are related to a machine and a list of jobs, numJob for number of job, numResource for number of resources, numJobAgentA for number of job of agent A
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file to read
        typeOfSort - the type of sorting
        Returns:
        a HashMap with a machine (key:machine) and a list of jobs (key:jobs)
        See Also:
        Job
